preface.title: OpenStack API Complete Reference
preface.para: Use the OpenStack APIs and extensions in your OpenStack cloud.

You must install the packages for each API separately. After you authenticate through the Identity Service API, you can use the other APIs and extensions to launch server instances, create images, assign metadata to instances and images, create containers and objects, and complete other actions in your OpenStack cloud. To get started with the APIs, see the OpenStack API Quick Start.
